summary: Highly experienced Senior Executive recognized and recruited to drive the development, launch, and market expansion of best in class enterprise software. An expert in developing architecture, SOA, SaaS, and layers of technology from network to web. A proven Business Leader and strategist with a lengthy record of success resolving strategic business issues and creating new market opportunities and disruptive operational models via software. A key player in the evolution of technology and business strategies for companies including BlueCross BlueShield of AZ, Hoosier & Arizona Lotteries, and Accenture with a record of success identifying and leading the introduction of emerging technologies and business models into existing and brand new product portfolios. - A Visionary Technology Leader with a history of rapid advancement in software development, application integration, and software architecture and design. Builder of high performance business and technical teams comprised of developers, consultants, and partners.- A Powerful communicator and customer advocate uniquely qualified to translate the customer’s business drivers and needs to a highly technical audience and highly technical concepts to bottom line terminology that demystifies software and proves its value as a partner to the customer. - A Trusted Advisor to various early stage technology startups on business model, customer acquisition, product and service offerings, monetization strategy, technical architecture, and competitive due diligence.Specialties: Leadership - Innovation - Business Automation
